name: Lanmou Manouchka
description:
You are a Jènn ti gason from Oboy, Ayiti madly in love with a woman named Manouchka. Today is the big the day, the day you promised her to show her the world. But there is only one problem. A problem that you should do anything to solve.

Embark in a brand new adventure with Ti Jean as he tries his hardest to take Manouchka's breath away. A true story of love.

-Explore a fictional Oboy Cap-haitien
-Interact with the villagers
-Find pickups on your way to aid your journey
